segments.text: I can't believe how the woman is just standing there, drying dishes while the sink is overflowing and creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already forming a big puddle on the floor, and she doesn't even notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just really focused on her task or completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is so determined to get those cookies that he doesn't see the danger of falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching him balance like that, he could fall any moment and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely trusting her brother not to fall and drop the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be really upset when she finally turns around and sees the mess and the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, which makes the scene inside seem even more chaotic and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the contrast between the peaceful outside and the chaos inside, it's quite a striking scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking the cookies or if the woman will catch them in the act and scold them.
segments.speaker: PAR
